About Red Lotus

We are a dedicated FTC robotics team focused on innovation, teamwork, and excellence in engineering.

Our Mission

To inspire and educate the next generation of engineers through hands-on robotics experience, fostering creativity, problem-solving, and teamwork.

Our Team

Composed of passionate students with diverse skills in engineering, programming, design, and outreach. Together, we build robots that compete at the highest level.

Our Values

We believe in gracious professionalism, continuous learning, and giving back to our community through mentorship and STEM outreach programs.
